en.pageTitle: Saturn Emoji 🪐 Copy and Paste - SaturnEmoji.net
en.metaDescription: Copy and paste the beautiful Saturn emoji 🪐 from the largest collection of planet emoticons. One-click copy for all your space and galaxy expressions!
en.ogTitle: Saturn Emoji 🪐 Copy and Paste - SaturnEmoji.net
en.ogDescription: The ultimate collection of Saturn emojis! Copy and paste 🪐 and more beautiful space emojis with one click.
en.clickToCopy: Click any emoji to copy to clipboard!
en.exploreDescription: Explore and copy the Saturn emoji for your messages and social media.
en.footerDescription: Your ultimate resource for Saturn emojis. Discover, copy, and share the perfect cosmic emoticon for any occasion.
en.saturnEmojiDescription: 🪐: The most common Saturn emoji, a representation of the gas giant with its iconic rings. It is often used to symbolize space, astronomy, or a sense of awe and wonder.
en.usageScenariosList:
• Astronomy and Space: Perfect for discussions about planets, galaxies, or celestial events.
  • Science and Education: Used in educational contexts to represent the solar system.
  • Aesthetic and Mystical: Can be used in a creative or mystical context to evoke a sense of magic, wonder, or the cosmos.
  • Personal Expression: May be used to represent a "ringed" personality or a love for space.
en.historyContent: The Saturn emoji (🪐) was officially introduced as part of Unicode 12.0 in 2019. It was one of several new emojis added to broaden the representation of the solar system and celestial objects, joining a small group of existing planet emojis. Since its release, it has become a popular symbol for space exploration and science.
en.interestingStoriesTitle: Interesting Stories about the Saturn Emoji
en.interestingStoriesContent: The Saturn emoji's release was highly anticipated by space enthusiasts and astronomers. It filled a notable gap in the emoji keyboard, which had previously only featured emojis for Earth and the Moon. Its inclusion was seen as a win for popular science communication, allowing people to more easily express their fascination with the cosmos.

zh.ogTitle: 土星表情符号 🪐 复制粘贴 - SaturnEmoji.net
zh.ogDescription: 土星表情符号的终极集合！一键复制粘贴🪐等更多美丽的太空表情符号。
zh.mainTitle: 土星表情符号 🪐 复制粘贴 🌌
zh.clickToCopy: 点击任意表情符号即可复制到剪贴板！
zh.exploreDescription: 探索并复制土星表情符号，用于您的消息和社交媒体。
zh.footerDescription: 您获取土星表情符号的终极资源。发现、复制和分享适合任何场合的完美宇宙表情符号。
zh.saturnEmojiDescription: 🪐：最常见的土星表情符号，代表着这颗带有标志性光环的气态巨行星。它通常用于象征太空、天文学或一种敬畏和奇妙的感觉。
zh.usageScenariosTitle: 土星表情符号使用场景
zh.usageScenariosList:
• 天文学和太空：非常适合讨论行星、星系或天体事件。
  • 科学和教育：在教育语境中用于代表太阳系。
  • 审美和神秘：可以在创意或神秘语境中使用，以唤起一种魔幻、奇妙或宇宙的感觉。
  • 个人表达：可以用来代表一种“有光环”的个性或对太空的热爱。
zh.historyContent: 土星表情符号（🪐）于2019年作为Unicode 12.0的一部分正式引入。它是为了扩大太阳系和天体表示而添加的几个新表情符号之一，加入了少数已有的行星表情符号。自发布以来，它已成为太空探索和科学的流行符号。
zh.interestingStoriesTitle: 关于土星表情符号的有趣故事
zh.interestingStoriesContent: 土星表情符号的发布受到了太空爱好者和天文学家的高度期待。它填补了表情符号键盘上的一个显著空白，在此之前，表情符号键盘上只有地球和月亮的表情符号。它的加入被视为大众科学传播的一次胜利，让人们能够更轻松地表达他们对宇宙的痴迷。
